review: I love the Stick! Better than all competitors other than Apple!

review: Except windows mirroring problem it is better than chrome cast.  However while casting pc to tv it frequently drops
author: Kamal Dhakal

review: Although I love my fire stick, occasionally the screen will freeze; the sound will continue and after about 30 seconds the picture will go fast to catch up to the sound. Is this a Wi-Fi problem? Is there an app to correct it?
author: Tara Sanderson

review: Couldnt get it working on my Sharp TV
author: paul

review: Good but i wish the free choices were better and it came with a game controller
author: Maiyah Cross

review: Sooooooo slow. We have Google Chromecast and a Roku and they are both so much faster to navigate through the menus. I don't know if we just got a defective one or what but the Fire stick is drastically slower than the Chromecast (also a stick) and the Roku (set top device, not a stick). We tried using this a few times and set it aside to return because we couldn't take it and I kind of forgot about returning it. I'm 10 days outside of the return period and luckily amazon is still letting me return it - thank goodness. We are going to try the Amazon Fire TV (non-stick) or Apple TV - hopefully they are faster. If not, I guess we will just get another Roku for the other tv!
author: Kate H.

review: Has the wifi range as advertised.
author: Shopper

review: Sure glad I got one, much better than Chromecast.
author: Gary E. Crossley
